document_data.name: The Laughing Lass
document_data.mainbody: '''The Laughing Lass''' was a cozy tavern in [[Suzail]], [[Cormyr]] that transformed into a festhall on warm evenings. The establishment was a popular spot through the 14{{th}} century and well into the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dungeon/198/Backdrop: Suzail|73}}
document_data.Location: The tavern was located in the commoners' part of the city, its southeast section. The establishment catered to locals and travelers alike.
document_data.Interior: The upper floors of the festhall were illuminated by [[perfume]]d [[oil lamp]]s. The wait staff staffed the upstairs private rooms, offering ales and foods.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Lass was frequented by the [[Vangerdahast|High Wizard Vangerdahast]], although he was careful to disguise his identity. [[Emthrara Undril]], a [[Harper]] operative, worked in the tavern as a stripper.
